rules_text:
Indestructible
As long as your party isn’t full, Thor, Smiter of Trees isn’t a creature. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
Other creatures you control get +1/+0
{1}{R}{R}, Discard a land card: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play them.
